text: Ricardo Gomes Raymundo (born 13 December 1964) is a Brazilian retired professional footballer and manager. ==Managerial stats== Team From To Record Record Record Record Record Record Record Record Team From To P W D L Win % São Paulo 2009 2010 Total Total Total 73 38 15 20 ==Honours== ===Player=== ====Club==== Fluminense * Campeonato Brasileiro Série A: 1984 * Campeonato Carioca: 1983, 1984, 1985 Benfica * Primeira Liga: 1989–89, 1990–91 * Taça de Portugal: 1995–96 Paris Saint-Germain * Ligue 1: 1993–94 * Coupe de France: 1992–93, 1994–95 * Coupe de la Ligue: 1994–95 ====International==== Brazil * Pan American Games: 1987 * Olympic Silver Medal: 1988 * Copa América: 1989 ===Manager=== Paris Saint-Germain * Coupe de France: 1997–98 * Coupe de la Ligue: 1997–98 Vitória * Copa do Nordeste: 1999 * Campeonato Baiano: 1999 Bordeaux * Coupe de la Ligue: 2006–07 Vasco da Gama * Copa do Brasil: 2011 Botafogo * Campeonato Brasileiro Série B: 2015 ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro Category:Brazilian football managers Category:Association football defenders Category:1990 FIFA World Cup players Category:Olympic silver medalists for Brazil Category:Olympic medalists in football Category:Medalists at the 1988 Summer Olympics
title: Ricardo Gomes
